trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around December 29th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAs we drove home tonight my daughter and I both saw a large glowing ball, like a roman candle but much MUCH larger, streaking towards the earth. It did not appear to be very far about the treetops. we drove straight to the the area we thought it might have crashed but didnt see anything. This was a first for me and I called police and tv news and made a report and so far we are the only ones reporting. surely other people saw this... i hope.
Summary: large ball of light coming down to earth
